TEXT.TITLE: GULF APPLIED <GATS> TO HAVE GAIN FROM SALE
TEXT.BODY: Gulf Applied Technologies Inc said it will report a gain of 2,900,000 dlrs or 89 cts per share on the previously-announced sale of its pipelines and terminals segment in first quarter results. Reuter
